extension.description: Adds a non-breakable space &nbsp; after each single-letter word (numbers included) and string specified in the setting of the plugin. Based on the NBS plug-in by effrit@mail.ru firstly published on the Joomla Forum https://forum.joomla.org/viewtopic.php?f=715&t=965369.

field.name: label
field.label: Add Button Label
field.description: Enter label text for the button

field.name: NBSafter
field.label: NBS afterwards
field.description: List strings and characters requiring a NBS afterwards. Separate with spaces. Case ignored. Default: [a-z0-9]

field.name: NBSbefore
field.label: NBS beforehand
field.description: List strings and characters requiring a NBS beforehand. Separate with spaces. Case ignored. Default: empty
